title: Vegan chocolate courgette cake
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '350g caster sugar', '85g cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '300ml almond milk', '125ml vegetable oil', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '250g grated courgettes', 'Icing', '75g dairy free butter', '4 1/2 tablespoons boiling water', '375g icing sugar', '1 1/2 tablespoons cocoa powder']
